verse: So these three men stopped answering Job, because he was righteous in his own eyes.
Then Elihu son of Barachel the Buzite of the clan of Ram became very angry. He was angry with Job for justifying himself rather than God.
He was also angry with his three friends because they had not found an answer, and yet had condemned Job.
Now Elihu had waited to speak to Job because they were older.
When Elihu saw that there was no answer in the mouth of these three men, his anger was aroused.
Then Elihu son of Barachel the Buzite responded and said:
